name: qq-music-controls
title: QQ Music Controls
description: Control the QQ Music app for macOS with your keyboard.
author: jwickers

commands.name: play
commands.title: Play
commands.subtitle: QQ Music
commands.description: Plays current track in QQ Music.

commands.name: pause
commands.title: Pause
commands.subtitle: QQ Music
commands.description: Pause current track in QQ Music.

commands.name: playPause
commands.title: Toggle Play/Pause
commands.subtitle: QQ Music
commands.description: Toggles play or pause of current track in QQ Music.

commands.name: previousTrack
commands.title: Previous Track
commands.subtitle: QQ Music
commands.description: Skips to the previous track in QQ Music.

commands.name: nextTrack
commands.title: Next Track
commands.subtitle: QQ Music
commands.description: Skips to the next track in QQ Music.

commands.name: toggleLyrics
commands.title: Toggle Lyrics
commands.subtitle: QQ Music
commands.description: Toggle the lyrics display on the desktop.

commands.name: shuffle
commands.title: Toggle Shuffle
commands.subtitle: QQ Music
commands.description: Toggles shuffle mode in QQ Music and play.

commands.name: sequential
commands.title: Toggle Sequential
commands.subtitle: QQ Music
commands.description: Toggles sequential mode in QQ Music and play.

commands.name: repeat
commands.title: Toggle Repeat
commands.subtitle: QQ Music
commands.description: Toggles repeat mode in QQ Music and play.
